marketplaces.name: cc-pocket-marketplace
marketplaces.repo_description: A marketplace for Claude Code plugins to boost development productivity

files.README.md:
# cc-pocket-marketplace

[English](./README.md) | [简体中文](./README.zh-CN.md)

**cc-pocket-marketplace** is a Claude Code plugin marketplace, providing a collection of plugins to enhance development productivity.

Currently, cc-pocket-marketplace includes the following plugins:

- **[iconify](/plugins/iconify/README.md)**: Searches and discovers icons from the [Iconify](https://iconify.design/) library directly within Claude Code

## Installation

### Prerequisites

[Claude Code CLI](https://claude.com/claude-code) installed and configured

### Register the marketplace

In Claude Code:

```bash
/plugin marketplace add cbingb666/cc-pocket-marketplace
```

### Install a plugin

In Claude Code:

```bash
/plugin install <plugin-name>@cc-pocket-marketplace 
```

For example:

```bash
/plugin install iconify@cc-pocket-marketplace
```

## Contributing

Contributions are welcome! Here are ways to contribute:

### Adding New Plugins

1. Create your plugin following the [Create plugins](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/plugins)
2. Place your plugin in the `plugins/` directory
3. Update `.claude-plugin/marketplace.json` with your plugin metadata
4. Test your plugin using `./scripts/validate.sh`
5. Submit a pull request

### Development Guidelines

- Follow the existing code structure and naming conventions
- Add appropriate permissions in the plugin manifest
- Document your plugin's functionality and usage

### References

- [Create plugins](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/plugins)

- [Create and distribute a plugin marketplace](https://code.claude.com/docs/en/plugin-marketplaces#optional-metadata)

- [Skill authoring best practices](https://platform.claude.com/docs/en/agents-and-tools/agent-skills/best-practices)

# iconify

Searches Iconify API for icons by query

## Installation

```bash
/plugin install iconify@cc-pocket-marketplace
```
